items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A simple Flappy Bird clone built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Control the bird, avoid the pipes, and try to get the highest score! This lightweight browser game works on desktop and mobile. Great for beginners learning game development.

items.content_html: Laminar, is a full-featured team communication platform inspired by Slack, architected with a modern microservices approach. It enables teams to collaborate in real time through public/private channels, one-on-one messaging, threaded conversations, pinned messages, and lightweight voice/video huddles. All of this from scratch

items.content_html: DOGGO is a lightweight AI-powered web app that allows pet owners to discover pet-related service vendors in their city. It groups vendors by city and filters them by service category (e.g., grooming, vet, boarding)
